overview:
Jonathan Novak is currently one of two Founders at BidBlink, Inc. He also heads up the engineering and technical effort at that company.

Previously, Jonathan was a Team Lead at WorkingPoint, where he learned the ins and outs of engineering in a web startup, building a first-class Ruby on Rails application with a robust JavaScript/AJAX front-end.

Out of college, Jonathan worked at Xyratex where he built web GUI’s to manage storage enclosures, built MPIO windows drivers, and directed the software team in building Xyratex’s software systems.

Jonathan graduated from UC Berkeley in 2004 with a B.S. in Electrical Engineer and Computer Science.
